mapper.select: SELECT id, title, start_date AS start, end_date AS end FROM calendar_events ORDER BY start_date
SELECT id, title, start_date AS start, end_date AS end FROM calendar_events WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar_events (title, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{start}, #{end})
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar_events SET title = #{title}, start_date = #{start}, end_date = #{end} WHERE id = #{id}
